name: galaxy-sim
description: A GPU-accelerated black hole accretion disk simulation in Rust with WebGPU

scripts.setup: npm install && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.precommit: cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy -- -D warnings && cargo test

author: Robert Gilks
